Because education can direct and aid nature but can never transform her.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: You can compromise between good, better, and best, and you can compromise between bad and worse and terrible. But you can't compromise between good and evil. And now people look at the other side as a completely different kind of animal and say, 'They are taking the country down the road to purgatory.' It's complete intolerance.
author: Gary Ackerman

quote: One of the best things we can do for our country, for advancing our children, is to upgrade our child care system.
author: Lois Frankel

quote: I am not trying my best because it is the Olympics. I try my best always.
author: Kim Yuna

quote: We all know what it feels like to be an outcast or a loner or to fall between the cracks. To be the target of gossip or people talking about you, or girls are ganging up on you. One minute, they're your best friend; the next, they call you on three-way.
author: Krysten Ritter

quote: I am easily satisfied with the very best.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: A girl's best friend is her pride.
author: Vanity

quote: I was never a pretty girl, so I wasn't the one to get the boy. I used to cast myself as a good sport. Sometimes I wonder if I do that too much with roles I play, because if I'm absolutely truthful, I quite like being the best friend, or the supporting role, and actually I ought to gear-change and make myself the leading role.
author: Celia Imrie

quote: Sometimes a little heartbreak is a lesson, and the best thing to do is just learn the lesson.
author: Jon Voight

quote: You have to be confident in who you are and what you're doing. Of course, you try to evolve. I would never tell you, 'Today is the best I will ever be.' I'm always trying to be a better chef, a better dad, a better person.
author: Guy Fieri

quote: I have great respect for the past. If you don't know where you've come from, you don't know where you're going. I have respect for the past, but I'm a person of the moment. I'm here, and I do my best to be completely centered at the place I'm at, then I go forward to the next place.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Guitar is the best form of self-expression I know. Everything else, and I'm just sort of tripping around, trying to figure my way through life.
author: Slash

quote: My dad said to me, 'Work hard and be patient.' It was the best advice he ever gave me. You have to put the hours in.
author: Simon Cowell

quote: Next to being witty, the best thing is being able to quote another's wit.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: You have to accept whatever comes and the only important thing is that you meet it with courage and with the best that you have to give.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: When I was a boy, the priest, my uncle, carefully inculcated upon me this proverb, which I then learned and have ever since kept in my mind: 'Dico tibi verum, Libertas optima rerum; Nunquam servili, sub nexu vivito, fili.' 'I tell you a truth: Liberty is the best of things, my son; never live under any slavish bond.'
author: William Wallace

quote: You must accept that you might fail; then, if you do your best and still don't win, at least you can be satisfied that you've tried. If you don't accept failure as a possibility, you don't set high goals, you don't branch out, you don't try - you don't take the risk.
author: Rosalynn Carter

quote: The best doctor is the one you run to and can't find.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: The best way to destroy the capitalist system is to debauch the currency.
author: Vladimir Lenin

quote: The best road to progress is freedom's road.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Maybe black and white is the best medium for landscapes, I don't know.
author: Fay Godwin

quote: I'm not the best person at putting words together. I can't give you the melody. But I might inspire somebody.
author: Meek Mill

quote: Being a mother and grandmother is the best of the best in my life. My grandchildren multiply the joy my daughters bring me.
author: Alexandra Stoddard

quote: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.
author: John Wooden

quote: Some of the best lessons we ever learn are learned from past mistakes. The error of the past is the wisdom and success of the future.
author: Dale Turner

quote: One of the best things that ever happened to me is that I'm a woman. That is the way all females should feel.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: The actions of men are the best interpreters of their thoughts.
author: James Joyce

quote: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: The best music happens when you have a personal connection to it. That same philosophy can extend to the instrument you hold in your hands: if a guitar means something special, you're bound to do great things with it.
author: Frank Iero

quote: I am for doing good to the poor, but I differ in opinion about the means. I think the best way of doing good to the poor is not making them easy in poverty, but leading or driving them out of it.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I am a gentleman. My natural inclination is to be on my best behavior.
author: Joe Wilson

quote: It is always the best policy to speak the truth, unless, of course, you are an exceptionally good liar.
author: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: Always go into meetings or negotiations with a positive attitude. Tell yourself you're going to make this the best deal for all parties.
author: Natalie Massenet

quote: I've only had two rules: Do all you can and do it the best you can. It's the only way you ever get that feeling of accomplishing something.
author: Colonel Sanders

quote: You always want to win. That is why you play tennis, because you love the sport and try to be the best you can at it.
author: Roger Federer

quote: After all, the best part of a holiday is perhaps not so much to be resting yourself, as to see all the other fellows busy working.
author: Kenneth Grahame

quote: My dad's my best mate, and he always will be.
author: Cher Lloyd

quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I'd like to think the best of me was still hiding up in my sleeve.
author: John Mayer

quote: Being in love is the best feeling on the planet. I really believe that love makes the world go round.
author: Sonam Kapoor

quote: I think we all have blocks between us and the best version of ourselves, whether it's shyness, insecurity, anxiety, whether it's a physical block, and the story of a person overcoming that block to their best self. It's truly inspiring because I think all of us are engaged in that every day.
author: Tom Hooper

quote: Real education should consist of drawing the goodness and the best out of our own students. What better books can there be than the book of humanity?
author: Cesar Chavez

quote: When employees are happy, they are your very best ambassadors.
author: James Sinegal

quote: Trying to make a feature film yourself with no money is the best film school you can do.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: What do you do with your best friend? You do nothing.
author: Blake Lively

quote: If you try to do your best there is no failure.
author: Mike Farrell

quote: What shall I say further? Shall I not stop short and leave to your imaginations to portray the tragic deeds of war? Is it not enough that I here leave it even to unexperience to fancy the hardships, the anxieties, the dangers, even of the best life of a soldier?
author: Deborah Sampson

quote: Part of what made the Macintosh great was that the people working on it were musicians, poets, and artists, and zoologists, and historians. They also happened to be the best computer scientists in the world. But if it hadn't been computer science, these people would have been doing amazing things in other fields.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: You get the best effort from others not by lighting a fire beneath them, but by building a fire within.
author: Bob Nelson

quote: The Court's legitimacy arises from the source of its authority - which is, of course, the Constitution - and is best preserved by adhering to decision methods that neither expand nor contract but legitimize the power of judicial review.
author: Diane S. Sykes

quote: It's fun to be on the edge. I think you do your best work when you take chances, when you're not safe, when you're not in the middle of the road, at least for me, anyway.
author: Danny DeVito

quote: So if diva means giving your best, then yes, I guess I am a diva.
author: Patti LaBelle

quote: I am prepared for the worst, but hope for the best.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Students shy away from Maths, but in reality Maths is the best friend of man.
author: Shakuntala Devi

quote: History is the only true teacher, the revolution the best school for the proletariat.
author: Rosa Luxemburg

quote: The best thing about getting a flu shot is that you never again need to wash your hands. That's how I see it.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Diamonds are a girl's best friend, and dogs are a man's best friend. Now you know which sex has more sense.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: The team that is going to win is the one that does its homework the best by studying its opponents.
author: Imran Khan

quote: My father is my best friend. He's my idol and my boss. We work side by side and spend every weekend together.
author: Eric Trump

quote: Nobody is gonna love you like you. You're gonna be your best salesman.
author: T.I.

quote: Loving a child doesn't mean giving in to all his whims; to love him is to bring out the best in him, to teach him to love what is difficult.
author: Nadia Boulanger

quote: From my experience, the best advisors help in three ways: encourage you to look at the problem or opportunity from multiple angles; help you balance the tug of the short-term with important long-term priorities; and ask the tough questions you need to know to reach the best solution.
author: Margo Georgiadis

quote: I do my work and do the best I can. I'm quite happy with my anonymity. All I can ever hope for is that I continue to do great work that will be remembered, and I leave my imprint so that my son can say proudly, 'That's my dad!'
author: Eamonn Walker

quote: Everything I do in life is framed through the view of a businessman. That's my instinct. If I go into a pharmacy to buy shaving cream, then I'm going to look for the best deal on shaving cream.
author: Donald Trump

quote: Go see 'Hidden Figures,' and take a young person! It will give a more positive outlook on what is possible if you work hard, do your best, and are prepared.
author: Katherine Johnson

quote: While it is desirable to build up the colored race, we must not sacrifice our best and purest white friends.
author: Hiram Rhodes Revels

quote: The fox has many tricks. The hedgehog has but one. But that is the best of all.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I'm competitive with myself, but not with other people. I set goals for myself. I don't really care about winning or losing as long as I do my best.
author: Lucas Grabeel

quote: Love and scandal are the best sweeteners of tea.
author: Henry Fielding

quote: I think it's brought the world a lot closer together, and will continue to do that. There are downsides to everything; there are unintended consequences to everything. The most corrosive piece of technology that I've ever seen is called television - but then, again, television, at its best, is magnificent.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: We have been educated into believing someone else's concept of the deity, and someone else's standard of beauty. You have the right to practice any religion and politics in a way that best suits your freedom, your dignity, and your understanding. And once you do that, you don't apologize.
author: John Henrik Clarke

quote: I didn't plan on being a single mom, but you have to deal with the cards you are dealt the best way you can.
author: Tichina Arnold

quote: No hours, nor amount of labor, nor amount of money would deter me from giving the best that there was in me.
author: Colonel Sanders

quote: The best thing we can do with rejection is to make it a learning experience - rejection is a great teacher.
author: Adena Friedman

quote: I have found it advisable not to give too much heed to what people say when I am trying to accomplish something of consequence. Invariably they proclaim it can't be done. I deem that the very best time to make the effort.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: The heart is the best reflective thinker.
author: Wendell Phillips

quote: The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.
author: Josh Billings

quote: There's a lot of integrity with musicians; you really still aspire to grow, and be great, to be the best version of yourself you can be.
author: Sheryl Crow

quote: The best measure of a man's honesty isn't his income tax return. It's the zero adjust on his bathroom scale.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: I just want to say to women, 'Be yourself - it's the inner beauty that counts. You are your own best friend, the key to your own happiness, and as soon as you understand that - and it takes a few heartbreaks - you can be happy.'
author: Cherie Lunghi

quote: One of the best pieces of advice I ever got was from a horse master. He told me to go slow to go fast. I think that applies to everything in life. We live as though there aren't enough hours in the day but if we do each thing calmly and carefully we will get it done quicker and with much less stress.
author: Viggo Mortensen

quote: We can't all be good at everything. This is partly the logic behind having a team in the first place, so each role can be filled with the person best suited for that role and together, every job and every strength is covered.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: I love spending time with my family and friends during the holidays, and my favorite holiday tradition would be the pozole that my mom makes almost every Christmas. It's the best!
author: Becky G

quote: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.
author: Sarah Orne Jewett

quote: Treat your kid like a darling for the first five years. For the next five years, scold them. By the time they turn sixteen, treat them like a friend. Your grown up children are your best friends.
author: Chanakya

quote: My best vacation is somewhere I could hide, somewhere warm and not a lot of people around.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: Your best T-shirt should be like your bed; it just feels like you are home when you are in it.
author: Ashton Kutcher

quote: The sailor's life is at the best a life of danger. He pursues honor on the mountain wave and finds it in the battle and in the storm, and never did more distinguished chivalry display itself than in the conduct of our seamen during the late war.
author: John Tyler

quote: Every kid has a toy that they believe is their best friend, that they believe communicates with them, and they imagine it being alive, their toy horse or car or whatever it is. Stop-motion is the only medium where we literally can make a toy come to life, an actual object.
author: Henry Selick

quote: Any captain can only do his best for the team and for cricket. When you are winning, you are a hero. Lose, and the backslappers fade away.
author: Richie Benaud

quote: Power is always dangerous. Power attracts the worst and corrupts the best.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: Honesty is the best policy; the only way out is deeper in: a candid confrontation with existence is dizzying, liberating.
author: David Shields

quote: Music is the best way for me to say I love you.
author: Mireille Mathieu

quote: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit.
author: Moliere

quote: I like to stay happy, and I like to live life light and make the best of life.
author: Ciara

quote: Arrogance, ignorance, and incompetence. Not a pretty cocktail of personality traits in the best of situations. No sirree. Not a pretty cocktail in an office-mate and not a pretty cocktail in a head of state. In fact, in a leader, it's a lethal cocktail.
author: Graydon Carter

quote: Education is the best provision for old age.
author: Aristotle

quote: I always find the mirror in the dressing room is where the best artists are.
author: John Lydon

quote: Obviously, the highest type of efficiency is that which can utilize existing material to the best advantage.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Since day one, since the first time I touched the pen, I wanted to be the best at what I do.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: I don't think of myself as a role model for others, but I like to live my life by my own integrity. So, in that sense, I might be a positive influence. I do believe you should get over your insecurities and just try to be the best you can.
author: Lily Cole

quote: I grew up very differently than a lot of other people in my hometown in Mississippi. But I can't imagine my life any other way. I flew home and surprised my best friend at his graduation, and I remember turning to my mom and saying, 'My graduation was so much cooler than this.' I had Melissa Joan Hart give my commencement speech.
author: Taylor Spreitler

quote: It's best to have failure happen early in life. It wakes up the Phoenix bird in you so you rise from the ashes.
author: Anne Baxter

quote: Meditation is all about the pursuit of nothingness. It's like the ultimate rest. It's better than the best sleep you've ever had. It's a quieting of the mind. It sharpens everything, especially your appreciation of your surroundings. It keeps life fresh.
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: No matter what, I'm trying to have fun and, depending on the mood, fun can be on a roller coaster and playing onstage, or fun can be sitting in a room with three of your best friends talking for two hours.
author: Shawn Mendes

quote: Friendships that have stood the test of time and change are surely best.
author: Joseph Parry

quote: The very nature of science is discoveries, and the best of those discoveries are the ones you don't expect.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: And while the law of competition may be sometimes hard for the individual, it is best for the race, because it ensures the survival of the fittest in every department.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: The communism of Karl Marx would probably be actually the best for everybody as a whole. But what he didn't figure into was human nature, and that's what corrupts it.
author: Jesse Ventura

quote: At the end of the day, you know yourself best.
author: Abigail Johnson

quote: Indeed, the best way to think of willpower is not as some shapeless behavioral trait but as a sort of psychic muscle, one that can atrophy or grow stronger depending on how it's used.
author: Jeffrey Kluger

quote: When you're going back to school, you want something fresh and new, and perfume is the best way to do that.
author: Bethany Mota

quote: The best way to appreciate our political process is to volunteer for a campaign and support a candidate you believe in.
author: Rob McKenna

quote: The best liar is he who makes the smallest amount of lying go the longest way.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Give people enough guidance to make the decisions you want them to make. Don't tell them what to do, but encourage them to do what is best.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: Participation, I think, or one of the best methods of educating.
author: Tom Glazer

quote: Personally, I just think rap music is the best thing out there, period. If you look at my deck in my car radio, you're always going to find a hip-hop tape; that's all I buy, that's all I live, that's all I listen to, that's all I love.
author: Eminem

quote: Use those talents you have. You will make it. You will give joy to the world. Take this tip from nature: The woods would be a very silent place if no birds sang except those who sang best.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Of all the home remedies, a good wife is best.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: A person always doing his or her best becomes a natural leader, just by example.
author: Joe DiMaggio

quote: Success has a simple formula: do your best, and people may like it.
author: Sam Ewing

quote: The best work is not what is most difficult for you; it is what you do best.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: The best thing about baseball is there's no homework.
author: Dan Quisenberry

quote: When I write I try as far as possible to forget I'm writing it at all. I tell it down onto the page, as if I'm telling it to one person only, my best friend.
author: Michael Morpurgo

quote: I didn't have any role models really. My best friend was a dog. My mum and dad saved a dog from the gutter and that dog was my brother before Jesse was born. Sami was his name and he was my role model.
author: Ville Valo

quote: The best way to learn is getting out there, getting reps, and making mistakes.
author: Ezekiel Elliott

quote: All significant truths are private truths. As they become public they cease to become truths; they become facts, or at best, part of the public character; or at worst, catchwords.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: The first 'D' is to dream: dream big - not for yourself, but for the country and for the world. The second 'D' is to discover: discover your full potential and the opportunities that surround you; and the third 'D' is to do. 'Do' means to act on your dreams and make best use of the opportunities you have discovered.
author: Kailash Satyarthi

quote: But what we can do, as flawed as we are, is still see God in other people, and do our best to help them find their own grace. That's what I strive to do, that's what I pray to do every day.
author: Barack Obama

quote: You need to think outside the box. You need to think differently if you want to sustain what, for me, is my peak performance: the very best that I can achieve as an athlete every day.
author: Tom Brady

quote: My attitude towards drawing is not necessarily about drawing. It's about making the best kind of image I can make, it's about talking as clearly as I can.
author: Jim Dine

quote: What we have found in this country, and maybe we're more aware of it now, is one problem that we've had, even in the best of times, and that is the people who are sleeping on the grates, the homeless, you might say, by choice.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Your purpose is to make your audience see what you saw, hear what you heard, feel what you felt. Relevant detail, couched in concrete, colorful language, is the best way to recreate the incident as it happened and to picture it for the audience.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: To study the abnormal is the best way of understanding the normal.
author: William James

quote: I can see a day soon where you'll create your own college degree by taking the best online courses from the best professors from around the world - some computing from Stanford, some entrepreneurship from Wharton, some ethics from Brandeis, some literature from Edinburgh - paying only the nominal fee for the certificates of completion.
author: Thomas Friedman

quote: The United States is the world's best hope, but if you fetter her in the interests and quarrels of other nations, if you tangle her in the intrigues of Europe, you will destroy her power for good and endanger her very existence.
author: Henry Cabot Lodge

quote: Every pilot thinks they're the best pilot in the world. I think I'm the best pilot.
author: Gordon Bethune

quote: The best way to minimize disagreement is to make sure that all the stakeholders are in the room.
author: Cheryl Yeoh

quote: Research has shown that the best way to be happy is to make each day happy.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Broadly speaking, the short words are the best, and the old words best of all.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: To be labelled a cheat - it's not fair. If I'm a cheat, then prove I'm a cheat or just leave me alone and let me do what I do best.
author: Mo Farah

quote: We have one life and we should cherish it and make it the best we can.
author: David Morrissey

quote: The best and safest method of philosophizing seems to be first to inquire diligently into the properties of things, and establishing those properties by experiments, and then to proceed more slowly to hypotheses for the explanation of them.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: We go out to practice every single day and we have fun out there, but at the same time, we're getting work done. We're going hard. If it's reps for the scout team, we're giving them good reps. If we're getting reps for the first team as a tight end group as a whole, we try and go out there and put our best out there as a group effort.
author: Rob Gronkowski

quote: I never for a day gave up listening to the songs of our birds, or watching their peculiar habits, or delineating them in the best way I could.
author: John James Audubon

quote: The best of healers is good cheer.
author: Pindar

quote: A blessed thing it is for any man or woman to have a friend, one human soul whom we can trust utterly, who knows the best and worst of us, and who loves us in spite of all our faults.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: Success in its highest and noblest form calls for peace of mind and enjoyment and happiness which come only to the man who has found the work that he likes best.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: I've been training super hard at the Lopez Taekwondo Academy in Houston, which belongs to my brother Jean. For me, I think confidence is the biggest thing; it's all mental. I train with the best of the best, including my brother Steven, a five-time world champion who won Olympic gold medals.
author: Diana Lopez

quote: If you die you're completely happy and your soul somewhere lives on. I'm not afraid of dying. Total peace after death, becoming someone else is the best hope I've got.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: In art the best is good enough.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: It is not enough to do your best; you must know what to do, and then do your best.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: The ideal man bears the accidents of life with dignity and grace, making the best of circumstances.
author: Aristotle

quote: Surround yourself with good people. People who are going to be honest with you and look out for your best interests.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: To refrain from imitation is the best revenge.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: I think the thing about that was I was always willing to work; I was not the fastest or biggest player but I was determined to be the best football player I could be on the football field and I think I was able to accomplish that through hard work.
author: Jerry Rice

quote: Trust is not simply a matter of truthfulness, or even constancy. It is also a matter of amity and goodwill. We trust those who have our best interests at heart, and mistrust those who seem deaf to our concerns.
author: Gary Hamel

quote: Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.
author: John Wooden

quote: The best weapon of a dictatorship is secrecy, but the best weapon of a democracy should be the weapon of openness.
author: Niels Bohr

quote: I always want to find the best burger in town.
author: Dennis Quaid

quote: I do not need a trophy to tell myself that I am the best.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: If we're going to bring out the best in people, we, too, need to sow seeds of encouragement.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is to do today's work superbly well.
author: William Osler

quote: Now I see the secret of making the best person: it is to grow in the open air and to eat and sleep with the earth.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: The best artist has that thought alone Which is contained within the marble shell; The sculptor's hand can only break the spell To free the figures slumbering in the stone.
author: Michelangelo

quote: The team which handles the pressure best, carries the day.
author: Imran Khan

quote: In my own relationships, I know that I should break up with someone who doesn't encourage me to be strong and make my own choices and do what's best in my life, so if you're dating someone who doesn't want you to be the best person you can be, you shouldn't be dating them.
author: Veronica Roth

quote: In any team sport, the best teams have consistency and chemistry.
author: Roger Staubach

quote: Sometimes in life, we try to do our very best to help others, and in the process, it brings some anguish to us. But we can't ever let that stop us. We can't ever be stopped from helping others and allowing them to have some sense of happiness and joy in their life.
author: Jon Huntsman, Sr.

quote: Living well is the best revenge.
author: George Herbert

quote: I knew that no matter what door you knock on in a Cretan village, it will be opened for you. A meal will be served in your honor, and you will sleep between the best sheets in the house. In Crete, the stranger is still the unknown god. Before him, all doors and all hearts are opened.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: The trite saying that honesty is the best policy has met with the just criticism that honesty is not policy. The real honest man is honest from conviction of what is right, not from policy.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: The best thing of all is God is with us.
author: John Wesley

quote: At its best, life is completely unpredictable.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: Everything is a blessing, even meetings. Whether it's meetings or running gassers or lifting, it's an opportunity, and the best thing to do is be thankful for it.
author: Eric Berry

quote: I would say I'm a nice person, and I take pride in the fact that I treat everyone really well, so there's no reason for anyone to ever come at me because I only want the best for everybody else.
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: It's not easy. I got lots of rejections when I first started out. If you want to write, you have to believe in yourself and not give up. You have to do your best to practice and get better.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Perfect partners don't exist. Perfect conditions exist for a limited time in which partnerships express themselves best.
author: Wayne Rooney

quote: Most of us start out with a positive attitude and a plan to do our best.
author: Marilu Henner

quote: I'm moving forward to do the best.
author: Pablo Sandoval

quote: I think the best riffs and the best songs come when you're jamming and having a good time.
author: Scott Ian

quote: The best part of being a mom to me is the unconditional love. I have never felt a love as pure, a love that's as rewarding.
author: Monica Denise Brown

quote: The best way to keep one's word is not to give it.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Science is the best idea humans have ever had. The more people who embrace that idea, the better.
author: Bill Nye

quote: The important thing is to learn a lesson every time you lose. Life is a learning process and you have to try to learn what's best for you. Let me tell you, life is not fun when you're banging your head against a brick wall all the time.
author: John McEnroe

quote: The best intelligence test is what we do with our leisure.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: I only think about the pitch. I want to do great. I want to be one of the best. I want to win titles. I want to achieve things.
author: Paul Pogba

quote: My job is to play quarterback, and I'm going to do that the best way I know how, because I owe that to my teammates regardless of who is out there on the field with me.
author: Tom Brady

quote: I would say laughter is the best medicine. But it's more than that. It's an entire regime of antibiotics and steroids. Laughter brings the swelling down on our national psyche and then applies an antibiotic cream. You gotta keep it away from your eyes.
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: The best ideas start as conversations.
author: Jonathan Ive

quote: Anytime you ride against the best in the world, it becomes a learning process.
author: Bonnie Blair

quote: Man, being reasonable, must get drunk; the best of life is but intoxication.
author: Lord Byron

quote: We run around so much - with the best intentions: I want to save the rain forest. I've gotta clean up the oceans. I've gotta save the dolphins. All worthy efforts, but if you're not centered and you don't have the serenity in your life you need to accomplish that task, you're not going to do a very good job.
author: Ed Begley, Jr.

quote: Compromise is the best and cheapest lawyer.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Having realised that in cooking there was a vast field of study and development, I said to myself, 'Although I had not originally intended to enter this profession, since I am in it, I will work in such a fashion that I will rise above the ordinary, and I will do my best to raise again the prestige of the chef de cuisine.'
author: Auguste Escoffier

quote: To fight the United States is like fighting the whole world. But it has been decided. So I will fight the best I can.
author: Isoroku Yamamoto

quote: The best way to find out whether you're on the right path? Stop looking at the path.
author: Marcus Buckingham

quote: I'm just trying to grow. That's one thing I told myself is, 'Don't worry about who people say is the best player.'
author: Kevin Durant

quote: The Grateful Dead, they're my best friends. Their message of hope, peace, love, teamwork, creativity, imagination, celebration, the dance, the vision, the purpose, the passion all of the things I believe in makes me the luckiest Deadhead in the world.
author: Bill Walton

quote: The best news of the Christian gospel is that the supremely glorious Creator of the universe has acted in Jesus Christ's death and resurrection to remove every obstacle between us and himself so that we may find everlasting joy in seeing and savoring his infinite beauty.
author: John Piper

quote: There is so much good in the worst of us, and so much bad in the best of us, that it ill behooves any of us to find fault with the rest of us.
author: James Truslow Adams

quote: Soap and water and common sense are the best disinfectants.
author: William Osler

quote: Actors are the best and the worst of people. They're like kids. When they're good, they're very very good. When they're bad they're very very naughty.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: Meals make the society, hold the fabric together in lots of ways that were charming and interesting and intoxicating to me. The perfect meal, or the best meals, occur in a context that frequently has very little to do with the food itself.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: I don't want to let my guard down and feel too comfortable. If you become complacent, you start feeling entitled. I'm ready to go dig ditches if I have to. Whatever I gotta do to provide for my family. Whatever I gotta do to make sure that I do the best possible job at whatever wonderful opportunities I've been handed.
author: Mark Wahlberg

quote: I believe in hard work, not luck factor. The best efforts will reap the best fruits. Nobody can take all the credit. We don't even talk about the efforts of the director, the writers, other technicians, etc. They all together take a film to another level.
author: Rakul Preet Singh

quote: The best math lesson we can teach college students this year is to subtract a tuition increase and benefit from the dividends of higher education.
author: Jodi Rell

quote: In every aspect of life, have a game plan, and then do your best to achieve it.
author: Alan Kulwicki

quote: I'm full of fears and I do my best to avoid difficulties and any kind of complications. I like everything around me to be clear as crystal and completely calm.
author: Alfred Hitchcock

quote: I believe the best mode of aiding convicts is so to apportion their tasks in prison as to give to the industrious the opportunity of earning a sum for themselves by 'over-work.' A man usually values that most for which he has labored; he uses that most frugally which he has toiled hour by hour and day by day to acquire.
author: Dorothea Dix

quote: Laughter is the best medicine - unless you're diabetic, then insulin comes pretty high on the list.
author: Jasper Carrott

quote: I'm at my best when people are depending on me. If it's just on me and I don't have nothing to do, I'm going to be lazy. On the football field, it's every single day, every play, knowing that people are depending on me to make my play. That helps me elevate my game to another level.
author: Von Miller

quote: When you're the best, you only want to surround yourself with the best.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: We all know the feeling of surrendering to the embedded biases of our devices. We let our cell phones ping us every time there's an incoming message and check our e-mail even when we'd best pay attention to what's going on around us in the real world. We text while driving.
author: Douglas Rushkoff

quote: Cynical realism is the intelligent man's best excuse for doing nothing in an intolerable situation.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: You throw your best punch, otherwise don't do it.
author: Don Rickles

quote: We need to remind ourselves that our ultimate goal is not to reduce greenhouse gases or global warming per se but to improve the quality of life and the environment. We all want to leave the planet in decent shape for our kids. Radically reducing greenhouse gas emissions is not necessarily the best way to achieve that.
author: Thomas P.M. Barnett

quote: I think by drawing, so I'll draw or diagram everything from a piece of furniture to a stage gesture. I understand things best when they're in graphics, not words.
author: Robert Wilson

quote: My own personal popularity can have no influence over me when the dictates of my best judgment and the obligations of an oath require of me a particular course. Under such circumstances, whether I sink or swim on the tide of popular favor is, to me, a matter of inferior consideration.
author: John Tyler

quote: I have made the choices that work best for me. I know I cannot please everyone, and that's fine.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: My mom and my dad was the best example of unconditional love I could see as a kid. I've known it my whole life. Interactions, kissing, hugging - it definitely wasn't the fake love.
author: BJ the Chicago Kid

quote: I'm living life as best I can - but I'm not exempt from failure and making bad choices.
author: LeAnn Rimes

quote: Recess and lunch are the best.
author: Ty Simpkins

quote: Negligence is the rust of the soul, that corrodes through all her best resolves.
author: Owen Feltham

quote: The best and safest thing is to keep a balance in your life, acknowledge the great powers around us and in us. If you can do that, and live that way, you are really a wise man.
author: Euripides

quote: I think music is the greatest art form that exists, and I think people listen to music for different reasons, and it serves different purposes. Some of it is background music, and some of it is things that might affect a person's day, if not their life, or change an attitude. The best songs are the ones that make you feel something.
author: Eddie Vedder

quote: I like something simple and traditional, like dinner and a movie. The best way to get to know someone is to have a conversation over dinner. And steak houses have a nice atmosphere - the lights are dim, and they usually have a band playing.
author: Kevin Durant

quote: I was blessed with certain gifts and talents and God gave them to me to be the best person I can be and to have a positive impact on other people.
author: Bryan Clay

quote: Brevity is the best recommendation of speech, whether in a senator or an orator.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Marilyn Monroe wasn't even her real name, Charles Manson isn't his real name, and now, I'm taking that to be my real name. But what's real? You can't find the truth, you just pick the lie you like the best.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: I don't say it in a cocky way, but I take pride in being one of the best at doing what I do.
author: Sean Combs

quote: When I became commander of the Joint Special Operations Task Force, I was leading thousands of individuals, from Special Forces to the broader interagency effort. I quickly realized that while we had the most best and most effective operators and small teams in the world, we were unable to scale.
author: Stanley A. McChrystal

quote: I live in the moment. The moment is the most important thing. That's my entire philosophy: Make the best of the good moments.
author: Rita Moreno

quote: I just made my album. I did my best. And I uploaded the video just to 'YouTube.' That was all.
author: Psy

quote: If we want the best pitcher, let's get Bobby Feller. If want the best football player, let's get Jimmy Brown; the best basketball player, let's get Bill Russell. If we want the guy who can do the best job for the United States - let's get Donald Trump.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: The joy is in the getting there. The beginning years of starting your business, the camaraderie when you're in the pit together, are the best years of your life. So rather than being so focused on when you get big and powerful, if you can just get the juice out of that... don't miss it.
author: Barbara Corcoran

quote: Songwriting is like editing. You write down all this stuff - all this bad, stupid stuff - and then you have to get rid of everything except the very best.
author: Juliana Hatfield

quote: Being is a spiritual proposition. Gaining is a material act. Traditionally, American Indians have always attempted to be the best people they could. Part of that spiritual process was and is to give away wealth, to discard wealth in order not to gain.
author: Russell Means

quote: I need quick, easy, and healthy meals that can power me through the day. I also try to eat locally grown and organic food as much as possible - it's the best for me and the environment.
author: Ashlan Gorse Cousteau

quote: Some women feel the best cure for a broken heart is a new beau.
author: Gene Tierney

quote: Watching a good actor is the best way to learn.
author: Kieran Culkin

quote: To me, growing old is great. It's the very best thing - considering the alternative.
author: Michael Caine

quote: In raising children, we need to continuously keep in mind how we can best create the most favorable environment for their imitative behavior. Everything done in the past regarding imitation must become more and more conscious and more and more consciously connected with the future.
author: Rudolf Steiner

quote: For me, it's not about being the best designer. I'm interested in being the best partner. The best collaborator.
author: Yves Behar

quote: In the best of all possible worlds, February 14 is a pleasant and sentimental opportunity to lavish your partner with attention or move your relationship to the next level.
author: Pepper Schwartz

quote: When a place gets crowded enough to require ID's, social collapse is not far away. It is time to go elsewhere. The best thing about space travel is that it made it possible to go elsewhere.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: We're all just playing our own game. I don't see it as a rivalry. We're just trying to play our best.
author: Michelle Wie

quote: During the holiday season, it's easy to forget that sometimes the best gift of all is simply the gift of time. I can't think of anything a writer would appreciate more than being given time and space to work.
author: Kate Klise

quote: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: The best way to remember your wife's birthday is to forget it once.
author: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: The best cure for insomnia is to get a lot of sleep.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: Youth is the best time to be rich, and the best time to be poor.
author: Euripides

quote: Remember, always give your best. Never get discouraged. Never be petty. Always remember, others may hate you. But those who hate you don't win unless you hate them. And then you destroy yourself.
author: Richard M. Nixon

quote: We truly believe with hard work, dedication and perseverance, we can become the best at what we do. No one wants to become mediocre.
author: Andy Biersack

quote: The 1st period is won by the best technician. The 2nd period is won by the kid in the best shape. The 3rd period is won by the kid with the biggest heart.
author: Dan Gable

quote: Perfectionism is not the same thing as striving to be our best. Perfectionism is not about healthy achievement and growth; it's a shield.
author: Brene Brown

quote: The best time to make friends is before you need them.
author: Ethel Barrymore

quote: Nobody's life is a bed of roses. We all have crosses to bear, and we all just do our best. I would never claim to have the worst situation. There are many widows, and many people dying of AIDS, many people killed in Lebanon, people starving all over the planet. So we have to count our lucky stars.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Google is my best friend and my worst enemy. It's fabulous for research, but then it becomes addictive. I'll have a character eating an orange, and next thing I'm Googling types of oranges, I'm visiting chat rooms about oranges, I'm learning the history of the orange.
author: Liane Moriarty

quote: Autumn wins you best by this its mute appeal to sympathy for its decay.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Confidence and empowerment are cousins in my opinion. Empowerment comes from within and typically it's stemmed and fostered by self-assurance. To feel empowered is to feel free and that's when people do their best work. You can't fake confidence or empowerment.
author: Amy Jo Martin

quote: You may call God love, you may call God goodness. But the best name for God is compassion.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: I didn't see it then, but it turned out that getting fired from Apple was the best thing that could have ever happened to me. The heaviness of being successful was replaced by the lightness of being a beginner again, less sure about everything. It freed me to enter one of the most creative periods of my life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Sincere and generous collaboration is the best way to fulfil the legitimate aspirations of each person and achieve great collective goals for the common good and the general interest.
author: Felipe VI of Spain

quote: It pays to get drunk with the best people.
author: Joe E. Lewis

quote: There is one rule for the industrialist and that is: Make the best quality of goods possible at the lowest cost possible, paying the highest wages possible.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Nearly all the best things that came to me in life have been unexpected, unplanned by me.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: You get the best out of others when you get the best out of yourself.
author: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: I hate cameras. I hate cameras and I hate camera phones. The camera's my worst enemy and my best friend. It's the way I convey my emotions to the world without saying a word, so I use it. People always say, 'You come alive as soon as the camera's on!'
author: Nicki Minaj

quote: Just live life. That's the best way to learn how to act. Just live.
author: Rory Culkin

quote: In assisting his 'neighbour' every day to the best of his ability, and keeping truth, honesty, and kindness perpetually before him, the Boy Scout, with as little formality as possible, is pleasing God.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: If I can bring happiness to people all around the world, then I will try my best to do so.
author: Tom Holland

quote: I think on some level, you do your best things when you're a little off-balance, a little scared. You've got to work from mystery, from wonder, from not knowing.
author: Willem Dafoe

quote: The most important thing is, whatever you do decide to choose, take it seriously and do your best.
author: Tom Sturridge

quote: I don't think there's any dearth of talent in India - we've always had the best juniors in the world.
author: Mahesh Bhupathi

quote: When we do the best that we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life, or in the life of another.
author: Helen Keller

quote: I think dress, hairstyle and make-up are the crucial factors in projecting an attractive persona and give one the chance to enhance one's best physical features.
author: Vivienne Westwood

quote: We should live, act, and say nothing to the injury of anyone. It is not only best as a matter of principle, but it is the path to peace and honor.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: If it's your job to eat a frog, it's best to do it first thing in the morning. And If it's your job to eat two frogs, it's best to eat the biggest one first.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Only the wise know just where predestination ends and free will begins. Meanwhile, you must keep on doing your best, according to your own clearest understanding. you must long for freedom as the drowning man longs for air. Without sincere longing, you will never find God.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Patience is the best remedy for every trouble.
author: Plautus

quote: It's best not to stare at the sun during an eclipse.
author: Jeff Goldblum

quote: I've got a long way to go to being the ultimate best, but I think my time is now. And I'm starting to enter my prime.
author: Kevin Durant

quote: Michael Jordon may have been the best basketball player in history, but he couldn't have won six NBA titles without a team.
author: Mark E. Hyman

quote: Just do the best you can. No one can do more than that.
author: John Wooden

quote: I lead no party; I follow no leader. I have given the best part of my life to careful study of Islam, its law and polity, its culture, its history and its literature.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Monetary policy will, as always, respond to the economy's twists and turns so as to promote, as best as we can in an uncertain economic environment, the employment and inflation goals.
author: Janet Yellen

quote: When things are bad, it's the best time to reinvent yourself.
author: George Lopez

quote: Older women are best, because they always think they may be doing it for the last time.
author: Ian Fleming

quote: The best piece of advice someone has ever given me was 'do it scared.' And no matter if you're scared, just go ahead and do it anyway because you might as well do it scared, so it will get done and you will feel so much better if you step out of your comfort zone.
author: Sherri Shepherd

quote: That's why you can't be a true Yankee without winter: because all the best pleasures are earned - the fire, the fried oysters; the warmer seasons, too. Who knows the real worth of summer at the beach without a good taste of the seaside in winter?
author: Julia Glass

quote: I had a realization in the midst of my happy marriage that I had kind of lost most of my friends - my male friends in particular. And I started wondering if my wife, who was certainly my best friend, supplanted those relationships.
author: Matthew Weiner

quote: I have believed the best of every man. And find that to believe is enough to make a bad man show him at his best, or even a good man swings his lantern higher.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: You have got to decide, look, this is who I am; this is my best way to present myself, and I'm going to ride that horse to the finish line. Not everybody will like it, but that's OK.
author: Phil McGraw

quote: The best loved by God are those that are rich, yet have the humility of the poor, and those that are poor and have the magnanimity of the rich.
author: Saadi

quote: Being forced to work, and forced to do your best, will breed in you temperance and self-control, diligence and strength of will, cheerfulness and content, and a hundred virtues which the idle will never know.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: A well regulated militia, composed of the body of the people, trained in arms, is the best most natural defense of a free country.
author: James Madison

quote: I don't have the best self esteem; mine wavers month to month, but I know how to pick myself up.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: Never die easy. Why run out of bounds and die easy? Make that linebacker pay. It carries into all facets of your life. It's okay to lose, to die, but don't die without trying, without giving it your best.
author: Walter Payton

quote: To me, being the best means proving it in different countries and championships.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four Americans is suffering from some form of mental illness. Think of your three best friends. If they're okay, then it's you.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: You just never give up. You do a task to the best of your abilities and beyond.
author: Debbie Reynolds

quote: You had better live your best and act your best and think your best today; for today is the sure preparation for tomorrow and all the other tomorrows that follow.
author: Harriet Martineau

quote: The scientific theory I like best is that the rings of Saturn are composed entirely of lost airline luggage.
author: Mark Russell

quote: A national political campaign is better than the best circus ever heard of, with a mass baptism and a couple of hangings thrown in.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Perfectionism is not a quest for the best. It is a pursuit of the worst in ourselves, the part that tells us that nothing we do will ever be good enough - that we should try again.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: I wasn't the prettiest girl in the room, but I learned to carry myself with confidence - that's how you make the best impression on people.
author: Priyanka Chopra

quote: Don't think too much. The best pictures come naturally.
author: Chiara Ferragni

quote: Regardless if what you do in the world, you do it good. You do your best, and you show up on time, and you leave and you do a good job, and you treat people the way you want to be treated.
author: Scott Eastwood

quote: The best mirror is an old friend.
author: Peter Nivio Zarlenga

quote: Everyone says Toyota is the best company in the world, but the customer doesn't care about the world. They care if we are the best in town, or not. That's what I want to be.
author: Akio Toyoda

quote: Some people think that you have to be the loudest voice in the room to make a difference. That is just not true. Often, the best thing we can do is turn down the volume. When the sound is quieter, you can actually hear what someone else is saying. And that can make a world of difference.
author: Nikki Haley

quote: Learn to invest in the best quality you can afford and wear pieces in different ways.
author: Michael Kors

quote: The thing that I think a lot of guys need to know how to do is not take your mother's advice about honesty being the best policy. Listen to your cool, drunk uncle who tells you to lie. Those are the relationships that last.
author: Adam DeVine

quote: There are lots of things which I would love to tell him, but in some way, I also feel that I lost the person closest to me. And I got a second chance to live. So in a way I feel that I live for both of us... and I will do my best.
author: Petra Nemcova

quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
author: George Halas

quote: The best leaders... almost without exception and at every level, are master users of stories and symbols.
author: Tom Peters

quote: We have a responsibility as elected officials to do good public policy in the best interest of all the people.
author: Maxine Waters

quote: Seriously, I grew up a fan of Hulk Hogan, and I think I bring some of his best values to the ring... the values of a superhero. Always do your best. Never give up... I think kids want to believe in that, and they should believe in that.
author: John Cena

quote: Being hardworking is the best thing you can show children.
author: David Beckham

quote: There is always some kid who may be seeing me for the first time. I owe him my best.
author: Joe DiMaggio

quote: At the age of 12 I won the school prize for Best English Essay. The prize was a copy of Somerset Maugham's 'Introduction To Modern English And American Literature.' To this day I keep it on the shelf between my collection of Forester's works and the little urn that contains my mother's ashes.
author: Wilbur Smith

quote: It was a unique childhood, to say the least. My father was born in Patiala to refugee parents and was a part of the Indian Air Force. The talented few amongst the Air Force pilots are made test pilots. Test pilots are best suited to look at the space programme as they are trained to expect the unexpected.
author: Kapil Sharma

quote: I did not wish to take a cabin passage, but rather to go before the mast and on the deck of the world, for there I could best see the moonlight amid the mountains. I do not wish to go below now.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The best morale exist when you never hear the word mentioned. When you hear a lot of talk about it, it's usually lousy.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: The best scientists and explorers have the attributes of kids! They ask question and have a sense of wonder. They have curiosity. 'Who, what, where, why, when, and how!' They never stop asking questions, and I never stop asking questions, just like a five year old.
author: Sylvia Earle

quote: Since no one but you can know what's best for you, government control can't make your life better.
author: Harry Browne

quote: Your best friend and worst enemy are both in this room right now. It's not your neighbor right or left - and it's not God or the devil - it's you.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: I work best when there's a safety trampoline of kindness.
author: Ruth Negga

quote: As a kid, you obviously dream of being a professional footballer. I would watch players like Ronaldo of Brazil and pretend to be him in the playground. But I don't think about trying to become one of the best in the world or anything like that. I just play football.
author: Gareth Bale

quote: The fast, flowing parts, the high-speed corners, that's where a Formula One car is at its best - changes of direction, pulling high g-forces left and right.
author: Jenson Button

quote: My objective is to be among the best.
author: Antoine Griezmann

quote: I'm going to go out and be the best quarterback I can be and get the most out of my potential.
author: Eli Manning

quote: My philosophy is that not only are you responsible for your life, but doing the best at this moment puts you I the best place for the next moment.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I marvel at the resilience of the Jewish people. Their best characteristic is their desire to remember. No other people has such an obsession with memory.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: My best moment? I have a lot of good moments but the one I prefer is when I kicked the hooligan.
author: Eric Cantona

quote: After I won Miss India, I realised I do not like failing. I just like being the best. I hate being a loser. So I just have to keep winning.
author: Priyanka Chopra

quote: Let's face it: Most of us don't realize it, but we are failing our kids as reading role models. The best role models are in the home: brothers, fathers, grandfathers; mothers, sisters, grandmothers. Moms and dads, it's important that your kids see you reading. Not just books - reading the newspaper is good, too.
author: James Patterson

quote: A historical event represents the best and the worst of that moment.
author: Rachel Kushner

quote: Our immigration policy should be driven by what is in the best interest of this great country and the American people. Comprehensive immigration reform will strengthen U.S. security and boost economic growth.
author: Charles B. Rangel

quote: I was born with my moustache and, no, I've never been tempted to shave it off. I don't spend a lot of time worrying about my face and, like Gilbert and Sullivan's Katisha, my best feature is my left shoulder-blade.
author: Robert Winston

quote: While it may be true that the best advertising is word-of-mouth, never lose sight of the fact it also can be the worst advertising.
author: Jef I. Richards

quote: It is best to rise from life as from a banquet, neither thirsty nor drunken.
author: Aristotle

quote: The man with the best job in the country is the vice-president. All he has to do is get up every morning and say, 'How is the president?'
author: Will Rogers

quote: Travel is one of the best anti-war weapons that there are. I've been to Iran, and if you're there you see little kids, cops, old people, cemeteries. Once you see that, you can't say, 'Oh, Iran, let's bomb them.'
author: Viggo Mortensen

quote: Every day, every one of us sets the stage for our sentiment, our confidence, and our success by getting dressed. When you feel great, when you feel your best, it opens up a world of possibility. Feeling confident and self-assured are important inputs into good days, successful days, and happy days.
author: Katrina Lake

quote: The days you work are the best days.
author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: I just always expect the best because I'm a competitor and if I'm competing, then obviously I'm trying to be better in everything.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: Donald Trump is at his very best, at his very best, when he talks about the issues.
author: Kellyanne Conway

quote: The best part about being with a group is that you don't have to do everything alone. You're with your friends.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: We're very simple people at Apple. We focus on making the world's best products and enriching people's lives.
author: Tim Cook

quote: The best preparation for the future is the present well seen to, and the last duty done.
author: George MacDonald

quote: Go right straight down the road, to do what is best, and to do it frankly and without evasion.
author: George C. Marshall

quote: Exciting literature after supper is not the best digestive.
author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quote: But I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Those that despise people will never get the best out of others and themselves.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: It sometimes feels like the workplace is immune from social upheaval. We go to work and do the best we can, and at the end of the day, we return to our lives. We don't abandon who we are, however, when we begin and end our workday. Who we are shapes how we are perceived in the workplace and, in turn, how we perform in the workplace.
author: Roxane Gay

quote: Borrowing knowledge of reality from all sources, taking the best from every study, Science of Mind brings together the highest enlightenment of the ages.
author: Ernest Holmes

quote: Everything I do and everything Pixar does is based on a simple rule: Quality is the best business plan, period.
author: John Lasseter

quote: The making of friends who are real friends, is the best token we have of a man's success in life.
author: Edward Everett Hale

quote: You know, I started this process of being a football player and I'm going to make it to the NFL very soon and I plan on finishing that. And by 'finishing that,' I mean that I'm going to go out and be the best that I can be and put everything forth to make that happen.
author: Robert Griffin III

quote: Set up another case bartender! The best thing for a case of nerves is a case of Scotch.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: The worst men often give the best advice.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: The best blood will at some time get into a fool or a mosquito.
author: Benito Mussolini

quote: I like that I've been able to maintain a good stomach and chest. Push-ups and sit-ups are my go-to. It is the simplest routine and the best thing to maintain my stomach and chest. I'll do about 100 of each a day, usually when I'm already warmed up.
author: Giancarlo Stanton

quote: I think the idea of participation trophies has gotta be a really, really great thing. Kids are under enough pressure as it is without encouraging them to be the best too early.
author: Taron Egerton

quote: In the long run, I believe that honesty is definitely the best policy. One can get away by being dishonest for a short term, but ultimately, honesty is what pays.
author: Kapil Dev

quote: The lesson is, because there will be many lemons in life, to learn to make the proverbial lemonade - and be open and honest. That's the best way of doing damage control and positioning yourself for success.
author: Vivek Wadhwa

quote: Why don't you start believing that no matter what you have or haven't done, that your best days are still out in front of you.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I was told at first that being different was a bad thing. Everywhere I went, it was just, 'You're too different'... And it turned out that being different was the best thing that ever happened to my career. It is why people travel to my shows. It's why people want to hear my story and buy my book.
author: Lindsey Stirling

quote: When you care about people's happiness and productivity, you give them what brings out the best in them and their creativity. And if you give them a choice, they'll say, 'I want an iPhone,' or 'I want a Mac.' We think we can win a lot of corporate decisions at that level.
author: Tim Cook

quote: Honesty, like my mama always says, is always the best policy.
author: Kelly Rowland

quote: I once won a second prize in a history concert. My parents came to the ceremony. Somebody else had won the prize for best all-around student. Afterwards my father said to me, 'Never, ever disgrace me like that again.' When I tell my Western friends, they are aghast. But I adore my father. It didn't knock my self-esteem at all.
author: Amy Chua

quote: The best way to predict the future is to change it.
author: George M. Church

quote: This is where I have wasted the best years of my life.
author: Greta Garbo

quote: I've done a number of Super Bowl ads. And that is the best advertising of the year. That is when people realize they're going to be compared directly against other ads.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: You know the best part of being a mom is getting that love. Honestly, you know, my son's love... a child's love is so pure, it just makes you feel so good no matter what.
author: Ciara

quote: Healthcare providers will compete to offer the best record of patient safety at the lowest prices. Hospitals and patients will benefit from having accurate information about areas of excellence and areas that must be improved.
author: Timothy Murphy

quote: The best way to be productive is to have a great team. So I spend more time than most CEOs on human resources. That's 20 percent of my week.
author: Kevin P. Ryan

quote: One of the best parts of a woman's body is that curve, and I go a little bit higher on all of my things to show off the best part of the hourglass.
author: Melissa McCarthy

quote: I have found the best way to give advice to your children is to find out what they want and then advise them to do it.
author: Harry S Truman

quote: He who has done his best for his own time has lived for all times.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Since I'm always working, my best holiday memories are definitely when I can just go home and spend time with my family.
author: Chris Brown

quote: The best way to have a good idea is to have a lot of ideas.
author: Linus Pauling

quote: Do not waste time dreaming of great faraway opportunities; do the best you can where you are. Open your petals of power and beauty and fling out the fragrance of your life in the place that has been assigned to you.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Everybody should be able to enjoy their life, because you only live once. So I just want to get it all out there and be the best role model that I can be, if people want to put me in that kind of predicament. I mean, I didn't ask to be a role model, because I'm not perfect.
author: ASAP Rocky

quote: Someone said adversity builds character, but someone else said adversity reveals character. I'm pleasantly surprised with my resilience. I persevere, and not just blindly. I take the best, get rid of the rest, and move on, realizing that you can make a choice to take the good.
author: Brooke Shields

quote: It is best for the wise man not to seem wise.
author: Aeschylus

quote: I think you make the best with what you've got, you know? Sometimes you have very little. And you just always try to rise to higher ground, because you're going to suffer one way or the other, so you just hope that you have strength and perseverance and good friends and faith, some kind of faith, to endure and move on to greener pastures.
author: Pierce Brosnan

quote: If we accept being talked to any kind of a way, then we are telling ourselves we are not quite worth the best. And if we have the effrontery to talk to anybody with less than courtesy, we tell ourselves and the world we are not very intelligent.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I'm really not that funny in real life! But I am the best audience one could find. I love to laugh.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: Like all technology, social media is neutral but is best put to work in the service of building a better world.
author: Simon Mainwaring

quote: Philanthropy and social change work are at their best when they are driven by your values and connected to what you care about most.
author: Charles Bronfman

quote: Globalization has changed us into a company that searches the world, not just to sell or to source, but to find intellectual capital - the world's best talents and greatest ideas.
author: Jack Welch

quote: About astrology and palmistry: they are good because they make people vivid and full of possibilities. They are communism at its best. Everybody has a birthday and almost everybody has a palm.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it.
author: Dudley Moore

quote: The longer I live, the more I feel that the individual is not so much to blame - not even the worst individuals, not even the 'best' citizens - as the system of corruption which has grown up about us, and which rewards an honest man with a mere living and a crook with all the magnificence of our magnificent modern life.
author: Lincoln Steffens

quote: My best personality trait that I think I'm very approachable. And my worst is that I can be moody.
author: Enrique Iglesias

quote: It is more important to eat some carbohydrates at breakfast, because the brain needs fuel right away, and carbohydrate is the best source.
author: Andrew Weil

quote: I am really close to my family. My cousin is my best friend!
author: Daniella Monet

quote: I've been through a lot of things in my personal and family life. That turned me into a fighter. I always strive to be the best I possibly can.
author: Hope Solo

quote: Our body is the only one we've been given, so we need to maintain it; we need to give it the best nutrition.
author: Trudie Styler

quote: Do your best when no one is looking. If you do that, then you can be successful in anything that you put your mind to.
author: Bob Cousy

quote: The best music is essentially there to provide you something to face the world with.
author: Bruce Springsteen

quote: I used to have all these plans and think 'Ah, I have my whole life figured out', but then I realized no matter how much I plan: life happens! So I find myself living day to day trying to do my best, embracing every moment as a learning opportunity and chance to get to know myself a little more.
author: Q'orianka Kilcher

quote: The genius of the United States is not best or most in its executives or legislatures, nor in its ambassadors or authors or colleges, or churches, or parlors, nor even in its newspapers or inventors, but always most in the common people.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Cognitive psychology has shown that the mind best understands facts when they are woven into a conceptual fabric, such as a narrative, mental map, or intuitive theory. Disconnected facts in the mind are like unlinked pages on the Web: They might as well not exist.
author: Steven Pinker

quote: That government is best which governs least.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Our most intimate friend is not he to whom we show the worst, but the best of our nature.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Our goal has never been to make the most. It's always been to make the best.
author: Tim Cook

quote: Being the best at whatever talent you have, that's what stimulates life.
author: Tom Landry

quote: We're made for the light of a cave and for twilight. Twilight is the time we see best. When we dim the light down, and the pupil opens, feeling comes out of the eye like touch. Then you really can feel colour, and experience it.
author: James Turrell

quote: Dumped? Fired? Scorned? Humiliated? Totally pissed off? If so, I've got great news! You might be on your way to living your best life ever - if you consciously choose to channel this pain into fuel - and use it to motivate yourself to become your highest potential self!
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: If you feel rooted in your home and family, if you're active in your community, there's nothing more empowering. The best way to make a difference in the world is to start by making a difference in your own life.
author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quote: Thanking you once more, I want to wish you the best of luck for your future life and to conclude by saying to you: Dream your dreams and may they come true!
author: Felix Bloch

quote: I think the most fun part about working on 'Good Luck Charlie' is spending time with everyone, honestly, because everybody on set is like my brother and sister and mom and dad. They're so fun to be around, so that's probably the best part about working there.
author: Bradley Steven Perry

quote: You teach best what you most need to learn.
author: Richard Bach

quote: If I pass away one day, I am happy because I tried to do my best. My sport allowed me to do so much because it's the biggest sport in the world.
author: Pele

quote: As we reflect back upon the tragic loss of Challenger and her brave crew of heroes who were aboard that fateful day, I am reminded that they truly represented the best of us, as they climbed aloft on a plume of propellant gasses, reaching for the stars, to inspire us who were Earthbound.
author: Buzz Aldrin

quote: When we go out there, we have fun, but we get to work, and I think we're at our best when we're having fun. Having fun is key.
author: Ezekiel Elliott

quote: If your best friend has stolen your girlfriend, it does become life and death.
author: Ben Kingsley

quote: I just try to be the best I can, but I'm human.
author: Selena Gomez

quote: The President of the United States should strive to be always mindful of the fact that he serves his party best who serves his country best.
author: Rutherford B. Hayes

quote: In 1977, when I started my first job at the Federal Reserve Board as a staff economist in the Division of International Finance, it was an article of faith in central banking that secrecy about monetary policy decisions was the best policy: Central banks, as a rule, did not discuss these decisions, let alone their future policy intentions.
author: Janet Yellen

quote: All of Koons's best art - the encased vacuum cleaners, the stainless-steel Rabbit (the late-twentieth century's signature work of Simulationist sculpture), the amazing gleaming Balloon Dog, and the cast-iron re-creation of a Civil War mortar exhibited last month at the Armory - has simultaneously flaunted extreme realism, idealism, and fantasy.
author: Jerry Saltz

quote: The promises of this world are, for the most part, vain phantoms; and to confide in one's self, and become something of worth and value is the best and safest course.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Someone once asked, 'What's your best pickup line?' I said, 'My best pickup line is, 'Hi, my name is Hugh Hefner.'
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: One of the best aspects of health care reform is it starts to emphasize prevention.
author: Anne Wojcicki

quote: I just feel my best when I'm all glammed up.
author: Kim Kardashian

quote: The best advice I've received is to be yourself. The best artists do that.
author: Frank Gehry

quote: Nature best teaches how to pray, and how to reverence all the gifts the Almighty has given us. She is like a vast outspread handkerchief, embroidered with God's eternal name, on which we may dry alike our tears of sorrow and of joy; she turns weeping into ecstasy, and fills our hearts with speechless, quiet reverence and resignation.
author: Robert Schumann

quote: Voting is a right best exercised by people who have taken time to learn about the issues.
author: Tony Snow

quote: Push-ups are seriously the best way to tone your arms - and they tone your abs at the same time! I like to do them when I'm home watching TV or listening to music.
author: Cassie Scerbo

quote: But men are men; the best sometimes forget.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: One way or another, we all have to find what best fosters the flowering of our humanity in this contemporary life, and dedicate ourselves to that.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: You should read history and look at ostracism, persecution, martyrdom, and that kind of thing. They always happen to the best men, you know.
author: George Eliot

quote: You truly have to make the very best of what you've got. We all do.
author: Mary Tyler Moore

quote: I have never gone on a real trip, never taken a holiday. The best holiday for me is spent in my workshops when nearly everybody else is on vacation.
author: Enzo Ferrari

quote: I have no regrets, because I've done everything I could to the best of my ability.
author: Robert Redford

quote: That's your best friend and your worst enemy - your own brain.
author: Fred Durst

quote: It might be said now that I have the best of both worlds. A Harvard education and a Yale degree.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The best evaluation I can make of a player is to look in his eyes and see how scared they are.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: I'm never quite cool, if you know what I mean. I'm basically the worst, best superhero.
author: Tom Holland

quote: When I played at Minnesota, Green Bay, those northern cities, Buffalo, they wanted to have those championship games at home. It was going to be an advantage to be there with their fans and the cold weather and all that. But when you've got a Super Bowl, and it's the two best teams, you want ideal conditions. You want to play a great game.
author: Tony Dungy

quote: If you are not emotionally involved, your client is not getting your best effort.
author: Joe Jamail
