quote: I always think that today is the best day that there's ever been. The song that I'm working on is always the best song I've ever written. The woman I'm looking at is the most incomprehensibly beautiful woman I've ever seen. These dogs that I have now are, by far, the best dogs I've ever had - although, so were the last pair of dogs I had.
author: J. D. Souther

quote: When you're telling a story, the best stories, every character has an arc. Every one. And that arc is usually about finding yourself, or about at least finding something about yourself that you didn't know.
author: Roy Conli

quote: It's very important that people know that I really enjoy everything that has happened to me. And I tell my kids... you're not going to be the tallest, fastest, prettiest, the best track runner, but you can be the nicest human being that someone has ever met in their life. And I just want to leave that legacy that being nice is a true treasure.
author: George Foreman

quote: As a father, you want the best for your son, quite obviously. You want to create the best memories for your son.
author: Bill Goldberg

quote: The best way to escape from your problem is to solve it.
author: Robert Anthony

quote: Whether it's the best of times or the worst of times, it's the only time we've got.
author: Art Buchwald

quote: And I believe that the best buy in public health today must be a combination of regular physical exercise and a healthy diet.
author: Julie Bishop

quote: The worst thing that happens to you may be the best thing for you if you don't let it get the best of you.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I repeat what I always say: I want the best for Argentina in every way. I never try to make trouble for anybody.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: As for my batting, the best part about it is I have never changed it. I have never changed my thinking, I have never changed my batting style.
author: Virender Sehwag

quote: Patience is the best medicine.
author: John Florio

quote: Poker is a game where you don't have to have the best hand to win. Poker is really reading other people and reading human emotion, which certainly comes into play in business.
author: Charlie Ergen

quote: One man's ways may be as good as another's, but we all like our own best.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Some sarcasm is best told simply.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: What was really funny is that as I got older all those guys who called me a sissy in junior high school wanted me to be their best friend because they wanted to meet all the girls that I knew in figure skating.
author: Scott Hamilton

quote: Since we live in this world, we have to do our best for this world.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: Perhaps it sounds ridiculous, but the best thing that young filmmakers should do is to get hold of a camera and some film and make a movie of any kind at all.
author: Stanley Kubrick

quote: We are all racing towards death. No matter how many great, intellectual conclusions we draw during our lives, we know they're all only man-made, like God. I begin to wonder where it all leads. What can you do, except do what you can do as best you know how.
author: John Hurt

quote: Smiles come naturally to me, but I started thinking of them as an art form at my command. I studied all the time. I looked at magazines, I'd practice in front of the mirror and I'd ask photographers about the best angles. I can now pull out a smile at will.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: There is no rule book, no right or wrong; you just have to make it up and do the very best you can to care for your family.
author: Kate Middleton

quote: You have to push yourself when you're older because it's very easy to fall into the trap. You start to fall apart - you just have to do your best to paste yourself together. I think doing things and being active is very important. When your mind is busy, you don't hurt so much.
author: Iris Apfel

quote: Look your best - who said love is blind?
author: Mae West

quote: Fit no stereotypes. Don't chase the latest management fads. The situation dictates which approach best accomplishes the team's mission.
author: Colin Powell

quote: I was in the bath at the time, and my dad came running in and said, 'Guess who they want to play Harry Potter!?' and I started to cry. It was probably the best moment of my life.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: The post office doesn't guarantee delivery, but it tries really hard. It's called best efforts communication. If you put two postcards in the post-box, they don't necessarily come out then in the same order that you put them in. So, that means that there's potentially disorder with your delivery, and that's also true in the Internet.
author: Vint Cerf

quote: No one likes doing chores. In happiness surveys, housework is ranked down there with commuting as activities that people enjoy the least. Maybe that's why figuring out who does which chores usually prompts, at best, tense discussion in a household and, at worst, outright fighting.
author: Emily Oster

quote: The large majority of the Negroes who have put on the finishing touches of our best colleges are all but worthless in the development of their people.
author: Carter G. Woodson

quote: The best cartoons have no words at all - just the image pops out.
author: Jeff MacNelly

quote: Hiking is the best workout!... You can hike for three hours and not even realize you're working out. And, hiking alone lets me have some time to myself.
author: Jamie Luner

quote: I will do my best. That is all I can do. I ask for your help - and God's.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: I've always had the greatest respect for and listened to both my father and my mother. I've always tried to follow my parents' advice because these are people who want the best for me.
author: Neymar

quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes only one day at a time.
author: Dean Acheson

quote: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I can not believe that war is the best solution. No one won the last war, and no one will win the next war.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: We are not race blind. Of course we still have racial tensions in this country. But the United States of America has made enormous progress in race relations, and it is still the best place on Earth to be a minority.
author: Condoleezza Rice

quote: You can best fight any existing evil from the inside.
author: Hattie McDaniel

quote: The best way to navigate through life is to give up all of our controls.
author: Gerald Jampolsky

quote: The best we can do is prioritize our needs and make choices accordingly.
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: Find out what you like doing best and get someone to pay you for it.
author: Katharine Whitehorn

quote: The best works do not necessarily get to auction. I like to draw, so maybe I give you a little drawing. And then eventually it ends up at auction. And then critics say, 'Oh, that's a bad drawing!' Well, I didn't say it was so wonderful.
author: Marlene Dumas

quote: The best is the enemy of the good.
author: Voltaire

quote: The best books... are those that tell you what you know already.
author: George Orwell

quote: The best of artists has no conception that the marble alone does not contain within itself.
author: Michelangelo

quote: My friends ask me if I want more kids, and I always say yes, I want more; it's the best thing you can have in your life.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: I'll probably never be the best actor in Hollywood, but I hope to be the hardest working.
author: Ashton Kutcher

quote: Market in India is big enough for several brands. For us, it's about innovation, making best product, and making the ecosystem better and better. If we do that well, then more people will switch from Android to iOS.
author: Tim Cook

quote: To think that our political organisation is immutable is the best way to hand the country over to the extremes.
author: Emmanuel Macron

quote: I've found that prayers work best when you have big players.
author: Knute Rockne

quote: The things we know best are the things we haven't been taught.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Most of the things we decide are not what we know to be the best. We say yes, merely because we are driven into a corner and must say something.
author: Frank Crane

quote: Look for your choices, pick the best one, then go with it.
author: Pat Riley

quote: First gain the victory and then make the best use of it you can.
author: Horatio Nelson

quote: There is only one real sin and that is to persuade oneself that the second best is anything but second best.
author: Doris Lessing

quote: Usually, the stuff that's your best idea or work is going to be attacked the most.
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: To give and then not feel that one has given is the very best of all ways of giving.
author: Max Beerbohm

quote: Our best thoughts come from others.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The best way to hold a man is in your arms.
author: Mae West

quote: The most basic question is not what is best, but who shall decide what is best.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: The best doctors in the world are Doctor Diet, Doctor Quiet, and Doctor Merryman.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Clever men are good, but they are not the best.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: You'll live. Only the best get killed.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: The best things in life are silly.
author: Scott Adams

quote: I did my best, and God did the rest.
author: Hattie McDaniel

quote: Life is best when you are in love.
author: Michael Moriarty

quote: Just do what you do best.
author: Red Auerbach

quote: The best thing to do with the best things in life is to give them up.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Exclusively of the abstract sciences, the largest and worthiest portion of our knowledge consists of aphorisms: and the greatest and best of men is but an aphorism.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Best to live lightly, unthinkingly.
author: Sophocles

quote: If you want to go somewhere, it is best to find someone who has already been there.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Culture is the habit of being pleased with the best and knowing why.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Everybody's got a job to do, and I do mine as best I can.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: The best way to keep your friends is not to give them away.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: The best thing about animals is that they don't talk much.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: The man who has done his best has done everything.
author: Charles M. Schwab

quote: I am the best in baseball.
author: Reggie Jackson

quote: One of the best things to do sometimes is simply to be.
author: Eric Butterworth

quote: The best person to get something done is a busy person.
author: Mark Burnett

quote: The creed of a true saint is to make the best of life, and to make the most of it.
author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quote: Enthusiasm is the best protection in any situation. Wholeheartedness is contagious. Give yourself, if you wish to get others.
author: David Seabury

quote: When you do not know what you are doing and what you are doing is the best - that is inspiration.
author: Robert Bresson
